description: Topped with bell peppers, olives, onions, and mushrooms.

description: Blend of mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and blue cheese.

description: Spicy buffalo sauce, chicken, and mozzarella cheese.

name: Meat Lover's Pizza
description: Loaded with sausage, bacon, pepperoni, and ham.

name: Mushroom Truffle Pizza
description: Creamy truffle sauce, mushrooms, and mozzarella.

description: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

description: Cucumber, tomatoes, olives, feta cheese, and red onions.

description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and balsamic glaze.
